basic.description: This course focuses on the balance of payments; disequilibrium and adjustments; birth, evolution, and demise of the Bretton Woods System; the managed float; international monetary reform; multinational corporations.
basic.subject: ECO
basic.title: International Finance

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ECO 2013 and ECO 2023; ECO 3203 or ECO 3223 recommended.
